A4.text: Jesus's teachings and the retelling of his life story have significantly influenced the course of human history, and have directly or indirectly affected the lives of billions of people, even non-Christians, worldwide.

A5.text: Jesus is considered by many people to be the most influential figure to have ever lived, finding a significant place in numerous cultural contexts.
